description: The OR_LOG_SCHBLOCK table contains OR management system log scheduling blocks.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the scheduling block information for the log.

columns.name: SERVICE_BLOCK_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value of the service block of the log.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
